seo.description: Learn how diBoaS uses cookies to improve your experience and analyze site traffic.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us remember your preferences and understand how you interact with diBoaS.

essential.title: Essential Cookies (Required)
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function. You cannot opt out of these.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies (Optional)
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our site. All data is anonymized.

rows.purpose: Stores your Dream Mode simulation data locally

yourChoices.title: Your Choices
options: Our cookie consent banner (appears on first visit)
The "Cookie Settings" link in our footer
yourChoices.deleteNote: To delete existing cookies, use your browser's settings.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this policy occasionally. The "Last Updated" date will reflect any changes.
